name: Halfdan-D
flavor_text: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description:
Agile post sights. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: GA Post

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.
perks.name: Outlaw
